import React from 'react'; import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import Rating from '../component/Rating'; import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import { useSelector } from 'react-redux'; export default function ProductScreen(props) { const { id } = useParams(); const productList = useSelector(state => state.productList) console.log("product", productList) const { loading, error, products } = productList const product = products.filter((pro) => pro._id === id)[0] return (
Back to result
  • {product.name}
  • Price: ${product.price}
  • Description: {product.description}
  • Price
    ${product.price}
  • Status
    {product.countInStock > 0 ? In Stock : Out of Stock}
); }
